lead_paragraph: Christopher Plaskon, 18, is accused of killing Maren Sanchez, 16, a classmate, in Milford, Conn., in 2014 after she turned down his prom invitation.

headline.print_headline: Plea Deal Talks  in Prom Killing
headline.main: Plea Deal Discussed in Connecticut Prom Day Stabbing

snippet: Christopher Plaskon, 18, is accused of killing Maren Sanchez, 16, a classmate, in Milford, Conn., in 2014 after she turned down his prom invitation.
abstract: Lawyers for Christopher Plaskon, charged with 2014 fatal stabbing of schoolmate Maren Sanchez in Milford, Conn, when two were 16 years old, are continuing to pursue potential plea agreement with prosecutors; Plaskon's family says he had been upset that Sanchez declined to go to prom with him.
